Wisdom: الْحَلِيمُ الَّذِي لَا يَشُقُّ [لَا تَشُقُ‏] عَلَيْهِ مَئُونَةُ الْحِلْمِ
enWisdom: The forbearing is one for whom it is not difficult to act with tolerance
Suppress [your] anger and you will increase in forbearance
The best forbearance is accustoming yourself to act with forbearance

Wisdom: إِنْ لَمْ تَكُنْ حَلِيماً فَتَحَلَّمْ فَإِنَّهُ قَلَّ مَنْ تَشَبَّهَ بِقَوْمٍ إِلَّا أَوْشَكَ أَنْ يَصِيرَ مِنْهُمْ
enWisdom: If you are not forbearing then act forbearing, for verily it is rare for a person who imitates a group not to soon become one among them

Wisdom: عِنْدَ غَلَبَةِ الْغَيْظِ وَالْغَضَبِ يُخْتَبَرُ حِلْمُ الْحُلَمَاءِ
enWisdom: It is when rage and anger prevails that the forbearance of the forbearing is tested

Wisdom: لَيْسَ الْحَلِيمُ مَنْ عَجَزَ فَهَجَمَ وَإِذَا قَدَرَ انْتَقَمَ إِنَّمَا الْحَلِيمُ مَنْ إِذَا قَدَرَ عَفَا وَكَانَ الْحِلْمُ غَالِباً عَلَى كُلِّ أَمْرِهِ
enWisdom: He who lacks strength and thus remains quiet, only to take revenge when he gets power, is not forbearing; rather only he is forbearing who forgives when he has power and over all of whose affairs forbearance prevails
One who endeavours to act with forbearance becomes forbearing
Whoever suppresses his anger, his forbearance becomes complete
One who opposes his anger has yielded to forbearance
One who does not endeavour to act with forbearance does not become forbearing
Delaying punishment is from the perfection of forbearance
The one who is forbearing does not use obscene language

Wisdom: لَا نَفَعَ الْحِلْمَ مَنْ لَمْ يَحْلُمْ
enWisdom: Forbearance is not useful for the one who does not show clemency
